name: THANATOS (Mini Jam 92)
description:
You're a little soul stranded in the land of the dead. Can you make your way back home?

It is quite difficult, as the more often you die to the enemies on your way, the weaker you get and if you get too weak, well, then you'll be too weak to return to your soulless body...

Submission for 'Mini Jam 92: Death' with the theme of Death and the limitation of 'Your Health is Your Weapon'. So yeah, this game was made within 72 hours, but actually less because I missed the start of the jam.
